title: IÃ±upiat Heritage Center: Donate
body: Donate       THANK YOU  Your interest in making a donation to Inupiat Heritage Center is deeply appreciated.   You can make a gift to benefit the park either directly to the National Park Service or to our primary non-profit, tax exempt partner, Alaska Geographic.  If you make the gift directly to Inupiat Heritage Center, your donation will be used for interpretation, research and enhancing visitor experiences.  No administrative costs are deducted from your gift, when given directly to the National Park Service for use in Inupiat. Your check will be deposited in a government account. Government accounts are non-interest bearing. To give directly to Inupiat Heritage Center, please mail your check to:  Inupiat Heritage Center PO Box 69 Barrow, AK 99723  The advantage of making your donation to Alaska Geographic is that the amount will be deposited in an interest-bearing account to assit projects or programs as requested and prioritized by Inupiat Heritage Center's managers.  If you have questions concerning donations, please contact us.
